name: THE MAD MAN
description:
You are the THE MAD MAN , who likes to create chaos .

Start fire and spread it to all objects in a floor to win.

CONTROLS :

W-UP

S-DOWN

D-RIGHT

A-LEFT

E-USE (HOLD E TO MOVE OBJECTS)

LEFT CLICK (HOLD)- ATTACK

M-MUTE

R-RESTART

Credits:

Music by frederickjbenjamin from Pixabay
